text: Anton Borisovich Nossik (; July 4, 1966 – July 9, 2017) was a Jewish-Russian start-up manager, journalist, social activist and popular Russian blogger (10th place in RuNet according to Yandex).Рейтинг блогов рунета Sometimes he is called one of the fathers of the Russian InternetНосик, отец рунета (26): Яндекс. Новостиor the first Russian-language blogger in the history. He was editor of the largest online news publications Vesti.ru, Lenta.ru,Пост главного редактора «Ленты.ру» занимал вплоть до 2004 года Gazeta.ru and NEWSru.com. Nossik died from a heart attack at the night of 9 July 2017 near Moscow at the age of 51. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Russian bloggers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Jewish activists Category:Jewish writers Category:Russian journalists Category:Writers from Moscow
title: Anton Nossik
